title: Kolhapuri gravy
description: Here are the steps in one word: Add: Add the gravy to water. Heat: Bring to a boil.Reduce: Reduce heat. Simmer: Simmer for 10-15 minutes. Serve: Serve with your favorite meats, vegetables, or rice.
